body.name: Afranti Micro Steam Iron Dry & Wet Ironing Portable Mini Steam Iron for Clothes Fast Heat Lightweight Titanium Plate Electric Heating Iron Wired for Home & Travel
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 16 hrs 47 mins
features: Obvious Effect - Afranti Ironing Machine adopts 2 in 1 design, dry and wet iron steam. The front of the heating plate is designed in a triangular tip shape, which allows flexible ironing of narrow areas such as such as buttons, plackets, and collars. The effect of removing wrinkles is great, allowing the details to be displayed elegantly. It is suitable for children and adults' clothing. It also can be used on silk, plush, cotton, linen, and other fabrics

Easy to Use - The clothes can be ironed directly after 30 seconds after turning on the power, and they can be heated to 302°F, within 10 minutes to achieve the best ironing effect. It is recommended to choose to iron the clothes after humidifying, the ironing effect will be better and faster. After turning on the machine, you can touch the water spray button to spray water to humidify the clothes. After the clothes are wet, turn off the spray button to start ironing

High Quality Titanium Metal Panel - The steam iron for clothes uses a large titanium panel, irons at a constant temperature of 302℉, quickly preheats, and irons smoothly. It can easily penetrate every fiber in the clothes so that the clothes can quickly recover as new, even the precious fabrics can be carefully taken care of without damaging the clothes

Transparent Visualization Water Tank - The mini steam iron features a 50ml integrated water tank. With a small measuring cup, it is convenient to add water, it will not leak, and you can iron multiple clothes at one time. Transparent visualization, keep an eye on the water consumption of the water tank, simple operation and safer

Portable Mini Steam Iron - The mini electric steam iron weighs about 0.55lb and measures 7.1x3x3.4 inches, which does not take up any space. It can be easily put into suitcases and backpacks, and can be easily carried anytime, anywhere. It can be easily carried with you at home and travel, and ironing needs at any time. It is a good companion for your travels and out goings. Suitable for vacation or business trip.
body.description: Portable Handheld Steam Iron The mini Handheld garment Iron is compact in design, small and light. 360 degree ironing without dead ends and can be used for all kinds of fabrics. It is simple and convenient to use, very suitable for family and travel use, you can enjoy ironing anytime, anywhere. Packing List： Electric Iron×1Charging Cable×1Measuring Cup×1Silicone Heat Shield×1Operating Instructions×1

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Portable Mini Travel Iron for clothes benefits from an ergonomic handle design that allows you to iron comfortably without feeling the strain on your wrists and shoulders. The Mini Travel Iron is designed with a high-tech chip that intelligently adjusts the voltage and can automatically switch between 100v-240v. This Mini Travel Iron can be the perfect gift for any occasion, such as anniversaries, birthdays, Christmas, weddings, etc.

Portable Handheld Steam Iron The mini Handheld garment Iron is compact in design, small and light. 360 degree ironing without dead ends and can be used for all kinds of fabrics. It is simple and convenient to use, very suitable for family and travel use, you can enjoy ironing anytime, anywhere. Packing List： Electric Iron×1Charging Cable×1Measuring Cup×1Silicone Heat Shield×1Operating Instructions×1 Specification Material: PC, PBT, Titanium Plate Size: 5.1x3x3.3 inches / 130 x 75 x 85mm Weight: about 0.55lb / 250g Voltage: 100V-240V Power: 38W Frequency: 50HZ-60HZ Heating Temperature: 302°F Water tank capacity: 1.7 fl.oz / 50ML

How to Use Open the water tank and add about 50 mL of water;Plug in the power cord of the iron, make the indicator light, and preheat for 30 seconds;The switch on the top handle is the water mist switch. Press it to spray the water mist, spray the water mist a few times;After turning off the spray, start ironing the clothes.

Warm Tips: Need to remove the silicone heat insulation pad when using. When the red light on the fuselage is measured, it means that the machine has been energized and Heat for 1 minutes ready for use. The silicone anti-scalding pad is a place the machine during use （Please note that machine needs to be side placed） After the panel has cooled down, cover it with a silicone pad to protect the panel from scratches and dust.
